content: materials - 3 skeins of purl soho s simply yak 1 100% yak each skein is 109 yards/ 50grams approximately 280 yards required - us 4 3 5 mm 16-inch circular needles 2 - a stitch marker 3 gauge 29 stitches and 39 rounds = 4 inches in stitch pattern unstretched size finished dimensions 18 inches in circumference x 12 inches tall originally designed by purl soho designer jake canton 4 click here 5 to see even more of jake s designs 1 https //www purlsoho com/simply-yak html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools/notions html collection_filter=964 4 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/jake-canton-for-purl-soho/ 5 http //www jakecanton com/
